mapper.select: select GD_NUM, GD_CODE, GD_KIND_NUM, GD_DEVICE, DK_NAME, GD_COLOR, GC_COLOR, GD_COUNT, GD_SELLCOUNT from Goods_Detail, (select DK_CODE, DK_NAME from DEVICE_KIND), (select GC_CODE, GC_COLOR from GOODS_COLOR) where GD_CODE = #{gd_code} and GD_DEVICE = DK_CODE and GD_COLOR = GC_CODE order by GD_DEVICE, GD_COLOR
mapper.update: update GOODS_DETAIL set GD_COUNT = GD_COUNT - #{count}, GD_SELLCOUNT = GD_SELLCOUNT + #{count} where GD_CODE = #{code}
update GOODS_DETAIL set GD_COUNT = GD_COUNT + #{count}, GD_SELLCOUNT = GD_SELLCOUNT - #{count} where GD_CODE = #{code}
mapper.insert: insert into Orders (O_NUM, O_ID, O_DATE, O_NAME, O_PH, O_ZIPCODE, O_ADDRESS1, O_ADDRESS2, O_STATUS, O_WAY, O_TOT, O_TNUM) values (#{O_NUM}, #{O_ID}, sysdate, #{O_NAME}, #{O_PH}, #{O_ZIPCODE}, #{O_ADDRESS1}, #{O_ADDRESS2}, '배송준비중', '카드결제', #{O_TOT}, null)
mapper.select: select GD_NUM, GD_CODE, G_NAME, G_PRICE, GD_KIND_NUM, GD_DEVICE, DK_NAME, GD_COLOR, GC_COLOR, GD_COUNT, GD_SELLCOUNT, G_DISCOUNT from Goods_Detail, (select DK_CODE, DK_NAME from DEVICE_KIND), (select GC_CODE, GC_COLOR from GOODS_COLOR), (select G_NAME, G_PRICE, G_DISCOUNT from Goods where G_NUM=#{g_num}) where GD_CODE = #{gd_code} and GD_DEVICE = DK_CODE and GD_COLOR = GC_CODE order by GD_DEVICE, GD_COLOR
mapper.insert: insert into Order_Detail (OD_NUM, OD_CODE, OD_NAME, OD_DEVICE, OD_COLOR, OD_COUNT, OD_PRICE, OD_DISCOUNT) values (#{OD_NUM}, #{OD_CODE}, #{OD_NAME}, #{OD_DEVICE}, #{OD_COLOR}, #{OD_COUNT}, #{OD_PRICE}, #{OD_DISCOUNT})
